column4: i have a question i have a graphics card and onboard video... i want to run dual monitors... am i going to need 2 video cards or could i run it with onboard and the video card?
depends really on the MB; especially AGP boards might not be able to use the on-board video and an (agp) card simultaneously
i really dont think they can do that
anyway, a single card with dual monitor outputs is the easiest way probably
